title: Coldplay - The Ultimate Viva La Vida
description:
This is the greatest version of Viva La Vida or Death and All His Friends you will ever hear.

The original track listing is largely intact, the changes are as follows:

"Life In Technicolor" has been combined with "Life In Technicolor ii", to make a perfect intro to the album.
"Postcards from Far Away" has been added to the end of "Violet Hill", much alike "Chinese Sleep Chant" at the end of "Yes".
"Strawberry Swing" and "Death and All His Friends" has been moved up to tracks 12 and 13 to make room for "Glass of Water", "Rainy Day", and "Prospekt&#039;s MarchPoppy Fields".
"Now My Feet Won&#039;t Touch the Ground" is the final track, a nice end to the album.
Included is a second disc with other b-sides, remixes, and such.

Full tracklist:

Disc One - Viva La Vida
01. Life In TechnicolorParts 1 & 2
02. Cemeteries of London
03. Lost
04. 42
05. Lovers In JapanReign of Love
06. YesChinese Sleep Chant
07. Viva La Vida
08. Violet HillPostcards From Far Away
09. Glass Of Water
10. Rainy Day
11. Prospekt&#039;s MarchPoppy Fields
12. Strawberry Swing
13. Death and All His Friends
14. Now My Feet Won&#039;t Touch the Ground

Disc Two - B-Sides, Alternate Takes, Remixes
01. A Spell a Rebel Yell
02. Lovers In Japan (Osaka Sun Mix)
03. Death Will Never Conquer
04. Lost+ (feat. Jay-Z)
05. Lovers In Japan (Acoustic)
06. Lost?

For the people who loved Viva La Vida or Death and All His Friends, this album is everything you loved plus more.
For the people who just liked Viva La Vida or Death and All His Friends, this album may make you love it.
For the people who hated Viva La Vida or Death and All His Friends, you shouldn&#039;t be here.

This is my first torrent ever! I hope people enjoy it!
